Underhill 37 * Contact: john.underhill@protonmail.com 38 */ 39 40 41 #ifndef QSC_SOCKETCLIENT_H 42 #define QSC_SOCKETCLIENT_H 43 44 #include "common.h" 45 #include "ipinfo.h" 46 #include "socketbase.h" 47 48 /* 49 * \file socketclient.h 50 * \brief The socket client function definitions 51 */ 52 53 /*** Accessors ***/ 54 62 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_address_families qsc_socket_client_address_family(const qsc_socket* sock); 63 71 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_protocols qsc_socket_client_socket_protocol(const qsc_socket* sock); 72 82 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_exceptions qsc_socket_client_connect_host(qsc_socket* sock, const char* host, const char* service); 83 93 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_exceptions qsc_socket_client_connect_ipv4(qsc_socket* sock, const qsc_ipinfo_ipv4_address* address, uint16_t port); 94 104 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_exceptions qsc_socket_client_connect_ipv6(qsc_socket* sock, const qsc_ipinfo_ipv6_address* address, uint16_t port); 105 113 QSC_EXPORT_API qsc_socket_transports qsc_socket_client_socket_transport(const qsc_socket* sock); 114 120 QSC_EXPORT_API void qsc_socket_client_initialize(qsc_socket* sock); 121 132 QSC_EXPORT_API size_t qsc_socket_client_receive(const qsc_socket* sock, char* output, size_t otplen, qsc_socket_receive_flags flag); 133 146 QSC_EXPORT_API size_t qsc_socket_client_receive_from(qsc_socket* sock, char* address, uint16_t port, char* output, size_t otplen, qsc_socket_receive_flags flag); 147 158 QSC_EXPORT_API size_t qsc_socket_client_send(const qsc_socket* sock, const char* input, size_t inplen, qsc_socket_send_flags flag); 159 172 QSC_EXPORT_API size_t qsc_socket_client_send_to(const qsc_socket* sock, const char* address, uint16_t port, const char* input, size_t inplen, qsc_socket_send_flags flag); 173 179 QSC_EXPORT_API void qsc_socket_client_shut_down(qsc_socket* sock); 180 181 #endif
